Can someone tell us if the SUBS are burned into the video --- or do we have a choice and can see it in English without the subs if we want to?
doesn't  anyone has better print of Thor by now ?

Yeah it is really sad that this has been out on DVD for ages, and there are only TS copies available still. I think what happened was a whole bunch of Thor movies and games with variations of the Thor titles, all in 2011, and that has confused people. Some people have probably watched the Asylum version and thought that was the one in the cinema or something.

Wake me up when a good hi-res copy comes up will ya.
Too bad that the text for the video is completely off just a little bit into the movie. text appearing 15 secs before it should...
please pleae please somoene release a propper quality of 2011 thor :(
@Rumour I'm not sure about that, DVD release date is set to Sep 13th.
